name: Neil Sims
review: I'm not sure whether everyone is reviewing the same online Bicycle store here, because I have had such a great customer experience (and there are lots of unhappy reviews). I placed an order (for an expensive mountain bike MIPS and DH rated helmet on the 4th of November which was price competitive here. After placing this order I read all the reviews and was very nervous!

name: Bonnie Green
review: Purchased a kids product and have received the worst service with the store cancelling the order without asking us and charging us a fee for no reason. Please don't purchase from this site, save yourself the headache and spend your money somewhere reputable.

name: Michael Gouge
review: Bought wrong size full faced Bell DHS helmet and they refunded quickly ($350), No hassles and good communication. I would not hesitate to buy from them again.

name: Molten
review: I ordered a helmet off this website and it was available for pickup in 12 hours. I got exactly what I paid for and at a good time so overall good service.

name: Jacks
review: Despite reading negative reviews I placed two orders with TheBicycleStore and I must say I had no dramas. Prices were unbeatable and shipments arrived in a very reasonable time frame considering the current environment. I would not hesitate to purchase from this site again. All good. Recommended.
